config.text_cn: 获取可见范围内的使用成员信息（不含部门、电话和邮箱）
config.text_en: Obtain the information of allowed members accessing the app (without department, phone number and email

config.text_cn: 获取可见范围内的部门和成员信息（不含电话和邮箱）
config.text_en: Obtain the information of allowed departments and members (without phone number and email)

config.text_cn: 可读取并可修改全公司范围内员工的以下信息：帐号、姓名、别名、性别、头像、手机号、座机号、邮箱地址、部门、职务、身份、员工企业微信二维码、员工对外身份信息
config.text_en: App can read and modify the following information of all employees within the company: account, name, alias, gender, profile photo, mobile number, office number, email address, department, title, identity, WeCom QR code, and identity information displayed to external contacts.

config.text_cn: 通过企业微信，授权可用范围内的成员登录第三方客户端应用
config.text_en: Authorize allowed members to log in to third-party apps via WeCom

config.text_cn: 获取可见范围内的成员添加的客户信息（不含头像）
config.text_en: Get customer info added by allowed members(without avatar)

config.text_cn: 「家校沟通」使用权限，包括读取家长信息（不含电话）和给家长发通知
config.text_en: Permissions to use Contact Parents, including the ability to view parent info (excluding phone number) and send notifications to parents

config.text_cn: 「家校沟通」使用和编辑权限，包括编辑家校通讯录和给家长发通知（一个企业只能授权给一个应用）
config.text_en: Permissions to use or edit Contact Parents, including the ability to edit Education Contacts and send notifications to parents (a company can only authorize one app)

config.text_cn: 可为可见范围内的成员写入考勤机打卡数据
config.text_en: Write attendance records of allowed members

config.text_cn: 获取由员工授权的文件
通过企业微信获得成员主动选择的可用范围内的常用信息（不包括手机号和邮箱）
config.text_en: Obtain general information within the available scope specified by members via WeCom (excluding mobile numbers and emails)

config.text_cn: 可通过企业微信公费电话联系你（不会展示具体手机号）
config.text_en: Allow contacting you via company-paid call (your phone number is not made public)

config.text_cn: 为你提供专属客服（添加$brand_customer_service$为外部联系人）
config.text_en: Provide exclusive customer service for you (add $brand_customer_service$ to external contacts)

config.text_cn: 为你提供专属客服（添加$brand_customer_service$为外部联系人），并可通过企业微信公费电话联系你（不会展示具体手机号）
config.text_en: Provide exclusive customer service for you (add $brand_customer_service$ to external contacts), and allow contacting you via company-paid call (your phone number is not made public)
